title: Virginia not-for-profit announces new grants for brain research
content:
The Virginia Biosciences Health Research Corporation is accepting applications for a fifth round of grants.

The funding will go toward projects that come up with new approaches to diagnosing, preventing and treating brain injuries, brain developmental orders, neurodegenerative disorders, neuropsychiatric and behavioral disorders, addiction and substance abuse. The awards range from $200,000 to $800,000 and applications are due October 21, 2015.
